content.raw: I think making it part of `ign_find_package` is definitely the right way to go, because any alternative that I can imagine would just be more confusing and less manageable. But moving forward, we should definitely be conscious of the risk of feature creep on this function and consider splitting its job up in some way if we decide that it's become bloated.
